broadwick.montecarlo

Class MonteCarloStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.montecarlo.MonteCarloStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MonteCarloStep
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A representation of the current step in a Markov Chain. The step is represented by a set of coordinates in the parameter space spanning the possible set of steps.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
